app.name: Tags Into Notices
app.short_description: Application to show notices if tags are present
app.long_description: Application that allows configuring notices to be displayed in the sidebar if some tags are present in the ticket, user, or organization
app.installation_instructions: Configure the tags by adding a JSON-formatted list into tags, for example: { "tag"\: "vit", "style"\: "warn", "link"\: "example.com", "description"\: "Very important ticket" }
app.title: Tags Into Notices

parameters.tag_identifiers: Tag list in JSON format (tag, style, link)
parameters.tag_styles: Style list in JSON format (style, CSS)
